Bio

I am a second-year Ph.D. student in Computer Science at Stony Brook University, advised by Prof. Yi Liu.

My research interests include Explainable AI, AI for Science, and LLMs for Science.

News

  • 05/2025: Paper An RL Agent for Drug Discovery accepted to the ACL 2025 Findings Track.
  • 04/2025: Presented work on RL Agent at the IACS Research Day.
  • 12/2024: Passed the CS qualifier.
  • 11/2024: Paper 3DGraphX accepted to KDD 2025.
  • 03/2024: Presented work on XAI for Science at the CS Graduate Research Day.
  • 01/2024: Joined Stony Brook University as a CS PhD student in Spring 2024.
